item.title: New version: chemistry/vasp version 6.4.3
item.description: The Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP) is a computer program for atomic scale materials modelling, e.g. electronic structure calculations and quantum-mechanical molecular dynamics, from first principles.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/nvhpc version 24.7
item.description: NVIDIA HPC Software Development Kit (SDK) including C, C++, and Fortran compilers.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/gcc version 12.4.0
item.description: The GNU Compiler Collection includes front ends for C, C++, Fortran, Java, and Go, as well as libraries for these languages (libstdc++, libgcj,...).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/gcc version 14.2.0
item.description: The GNU Compiler Collection includes front ends for C, C++, Fortran, Java, and Go, as well as libraries for these languages (libstdc++, libgcj,...).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/opencv version 4.10.0
item.description: OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer vision and machine learning software library.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/hdf5 version 1.14.4
item.description: HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/openmpi version 5.0.5
item.description: The Open MPI Project is an open source Message Passing Interface implementation that is developed and maintained by a consortium of academic, research, and industry partners.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-scalene version 1.55.4_py312
item.description: Scalene is a high-performance, high-precision CPU, GPU, and memory profiler for Python with AI-powered optimization proposals
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-scalene version 1.55.4_py39
item.description: Scalene is a high-performance, high-precision CPU, GPU, and memory profiler for Python with AI-powered optimization proposals
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/py-nvidia-ml-py version 12.560.30_py312
item.description: Python bindings to the NVIDIA Management Library.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/py-nvidia-ml-py version 12.560.30_py39
item.description: Python bindings to the NVIDIA Management Library.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/java version 21.0.4
item.description: Java is a general-purpose computer programming language that is concurrent, class-based, object-oriented,[14] and specifically designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/nccl version 2.23.4
item.description: NCCL (pronounced 'Nickel') is a stand-alone library of standard collective communication routines, such as all-gather, reduce, broadcast, etc., that have been optimized to achieve high bandwidth over PCIe.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/nsight-systems version 2024.4
item.description: NVIDIA Nsight™ Systems is a system-wide performance analysis tool designed to visualize an application’s algorithms, identify the largest opportunities to optimize, and tune to scale efficiently across any quantity or size of CPUs and GPUs, from large servers to our smallest systems-on-a-chip (SoCs).
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/xcb-util-cursor version 0.1.5
item.description: The XCB util modules provides a number of libraries which sit on top of libxcb, the core X protocol library, and some of the extension libraries.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/xcb-proto version 1.17.0
item.description: xcb-proto provides the XML-XCB protocol descriptions that libxcb uses to generate the majority of its code and API.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/libxcb version 1.17.0
item.description: The X protocol C-language Binding (XCB) is a replacement for Xlib featuring a small footprint, latency hiding, direct access to the protocol, improved threading support, and extensibility.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/cuda version 12.6.1
item.description: CUDA is a parallel computing platform and application programming interface (API) model created by Nvidia. It allows software developers and software engineers to use a CUDA-enabled graphics processing unit (GPU) for general purpose processing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/openblas version 0.3.28
item.description: OpenBLAS is an optimized BLAS library
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/dorado version 0.7.3
item.description: Dorado is a high-performance, easy-to-use, open source basecaller for Oxford Nanopore reads.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/py-scanpy version 1.10.2_py312
item.description: Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression data.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/py-numba version 0.60.0_py312
item.description: Numba is a compiler for Python array and numerical functions that gives you the power to speed up your applications with high performance functions written directly in Python..
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/julia version 1.10.5
item.description: Julia is a high-level, high-performance dynamic programming language for numerical computing.

item.title: New version: devel/julia version 1.9.4
item.description: Julia is a high-level, high-performance dynamic programming language for numerical computing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/restic version 0.17.0
item.description: Fast, secure, efficient backup program.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/pixi version 0.28.1
item.description: Pixi is a package management tool for developers. It allows the developer to install libraries and applications in a reproducible way.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/uv version 0.3.5
item.description: An extremely fast Python package and project manager, written in Rust.

item.description: Larch is a open-source library and set of applications for processing and analyzing X-ray absorption and fluorescence spectroscopy data and X-ray fluorescence and diffraction image data from synchrotron beamlines.

item.description: wxPython is the cross-platform GUI toolkit for the Python language,

item.description: The BCL Convert App generates demultiplexed FASTQ files from a run as input.
